name: Wild Lion Hunter Simulator
description:
Master hunting of forest king... a dangerous journey of kill shot, either to have prey or become victim of prey. Lion hunting super sniper shooting is a bold attack to win the boundaries of jungle. A dragon fighting for ruling the empire. There could be only one emperor, so take challenge of 3d blast mission and prove who would be that.

Save your people from the deadly attack of beast animal. Go to explore the 3D forest and do rush attack on lion before that he run to smash you. Find your target and fire on it in the correct direction so that you may not miss the chance. Lion hunting sniper shooting is ever best simulator game with 3d graphics animation to enhance your courage to take bold actions in life and plan protection strategies. Lion attack battle is all about an unexpected appearance of dragon enemy on your way but because you are armed with weapon so don't show cowardice instead that face it manfully. Use advanced fighting guns like AK-47, AWM Sniper, P.88 Sniper and Heavy Sniper for sniper shooting.

This is a game of solo battle champion and when two stars strike then it is constrained to produce blast. Here once again the game is operating survival mission...the survival of human beings. Fighting route contains four fresh environment and long chain of assault levels in each one. These interlinked parts of game offers you high range shooting zone to play more and more... nonstop adventurous journey.

Take into account of its playing criteria.. Apart from the first level of each scenic place rest of all the missions are strictly prohibited. You can’t play until you follow the success rule. Get permit to play them by your winning score if not then use your pocket money to purchase them. Lion & man survival combat gives you close view of target and expect a wise action to ruined opponent. Timely management and conscious usage of shot chances may lead you towards victory
